title: Interpretation of seeing banknotes in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing banknotes in a dream by Ibn Sirin: I see paper money in a dream. The dreamer must review himself and be close to the Creator and avoid shortcomings in the right of Almighty God. But if he sees a banknote in his dream, this indicates the provision of righteous offspring, a male child, and morals and justice from his parents. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is spending a piece of money and the paper indicates the loss or loss of one of his children, then only God knows the unseen. A paper currency in a dream for the dreamer indicates kindness and multiple livelihoods. But if the dreamer sees a hoard of money and paper money appears, he will collect a lot of money in A short period of time. However, if the fortuneteller tries to get rid of the money, according to Ibn Sirin, this indicates the death of worry and anxiety and getting rid of the crises and problems that he is currently experiencing. But when you see a lot of banknotes, it shows in the dream many, many fears for the fortuneteller, as well as Meaning that he is going through a difficult and difficult time. Interpretation of seeing torn banknotes in a dream. Seeing torn banknotes in a dream, but they decrease, shows the lack of worries and burdens on the dreamer’s shoulders, and God knows best. It also indicates religiosity, closeness to God, and observance of duties and worship. A shot of money. Leaving the house in a dream indicates the death of worries. The dreamer and his troubles. Money in the fortuneteller’s dream indicates strength, achieving what he sought in an amazing way, and the ability to control and control the workplace. Interpretation of the green leaf for a married woman. Carrying banknotes in a dream at home indicates that he has a lot of money at home, and God knows best. Interpretation of paper money - green color: In the dream, the dreamer has the benefits that accrue to the dreamer and the benefits as well. Coins in the dream indicate hateful talk and hearing what they did not do, and God knows best. Dreaming about money indicates high positions and status and then a great social position. I see paper money in the dream shows problems. There are many problems in the life of the dreamer and quarrels between the parents due to disagreements between them. But if money is distributed in a dream, this indicates extravagance in interest and interest-free money, and appearing and displaying it in front of others. Moreover, distributed it indicates that you are doing many good deeds and you have confidence in putting the money in The right side for that. It is one of those visions that has a lot to do with the dreamer and his intentions and what he tends to do and puts his goal in his head. Seeing paper money in a single woman’s dreamI am seeing a free girlIn a dream, money indicates the fulfillment of the desires and goals that she seeks. But if she sees money Flying around and over her head in a dream, this is a warning and she must be careful of the people around her. Interpretation of dropping paper money for a married woman: The vision shows that he has a lot and a lot of money and that he lives in luxury and family stability. As for giving the husband a lot of money, the wife in a dream shows a good relationship And the transaction between them, and she does her best to make her family happy. Paper money in dreams for married people. It indicates marriage.

title: Interpretation of lettuce in a dream: Eating lettuce in a dream

preview.html: Seeing lettuce for a single, married, pregnant or divorced girl, either washing the distribution papers, or giving, buying from the market, eating and more according to Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq and. Nabulus Interpretation of seeing lettuce in a dream Seeing leafy vegetables in a dream is a vision of good and joyful news, and among these vegetables is lettuce that many dream of, which has many meanings, including the satisfaction of desires, and lettuce can symbolize someone’s concern or problems and issues. The vision of eating lettuce, cutting it, picking it, and harvesting it varies. Seeing lettuce for an unmarried girl growing up is evidence of bad news followed by happy news. As for seeing her buying lettuce, it is a symbol of the goodness and joy that will fill her life and is evidence of satisfying desires and gaining a lot of money. Seeing a single girl cutting lettuce is evidence of eliminating all the problems she faces, while planting lettuce is evidence of satisfying desires and eating lettuce is evidence of an unmarried girl. For a married woman, it is evidence of the difficulties she faces in her life and may indicate that she will leave her lover. As for a married man, seeing lettuce is evidence of life and family problems that are difficult to solve in his life. As for planting lettuce, it is an indication of a project that he is thinking about and from which he will reap a lot of profits. Seeing him cutting lettuce is evidence that he is facing problems in his life that he will get rid of easily. Lettuce is also an indication of the big problems that will arise between him and his wife, which will end soon. As for a married woman, seeing lettuce is evidence of good health, and seeing lettuce growing is evidence of evil in the world. Her life is of the people she knows. Seeing lettuce on top is evidence of satisfying desires and assuming responsibility, and lettuce in general is evidence of the joy that comes after fatigue. As for a man, seeing lettuce is evidence that he will live a simple life, and seeing lettuce growing is evidence of problems in his life. He cannot solve it, and buying lettuce in a dream indicates that he is dealing with problems. Seeing cut lettuce in a dream is evidence of the disintegration of false relationships present in one’s life, and whoever grows lettuce is evidence that he is facing difficulties in his work and will get rid of them after a short period of time. Seeing lettuce for a pregnant woman while harvesting it is evidence of the person’s proximity to hatred or envy. Buying lettuce is evidence of the goodness that you will receive after a while. As for a pregnant woman, eating lettuce is a sign of goodness and blessings, and growing lettuce indicates an easy birth and that she will be blessed and in good health after giving birth. Seeing someone planting lettuce in a dream for young people is evidence that they will do a good job from which they will reap a lot of goodness, and eating lettuce is a sign of happiness that will prevail. Their lives, while cutting lettuce is evidence of freedom from troubles and problems in their lives and buying lettuce is a sign of their irresponsible behavior. If you see lettuce growing healthy and green, it means that you will enjoy a much desired benefit after minor disturbances. If you eat lettuce, illness will separate you from your girlfriend or colleague, or the reason may be secondary envy. If a woman dreams that she is planting lettuce, this means that she will be happy

title: The 9 best interpretations of seeing yourself fasting in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of fasting in a dream? An indication of the high cost and prices of goods. The meaning of seeing fasting for two months? Evidence of sin and repentance. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself fasting forever in a dream? Evidence that a person avoids sins. Interpretation of seeing a married woman fasting in a dream? Evidence of Stability of her life with her husband and children. What is the interpretation of fasting in an unmarried girl’s dream? A guide to getting rid of obstacles. Interpretation of a dream about fasting by Ibn Sirin. Fasting in a dream, as Ibn Sirin explains, is a sign of kindness, nutrition, and good health. Fasting is evidence of the dreamer’s righteousness and the strength of his faith. As for Regarding seeing fasting in a dream, it could be an indication of a rise in the prices of goods and services. If a person sees in a dream that he is fasting during the day of Ramadan and waiting for the time of breaking the fast, this is a sign that God Almighty is taking care of him and protecting him. If you dream of fasting days that are far from the month of Ramadan, this indicates Healing from illness. Seeing a person in a dream that he fasts for a whole year indicates repentance. Seeing a dream about fasting for a man. Whoever sees in a dream that he is breaking his fast during the month of Ramadan, this indicates that he is far from God Almighty. Then seeing fasting for two months is evidence of sin and repentance. And whoever sees... Dreaming that he fasted Ramadan after its end indicates illness. Then, seeing eternal fasting in a dream is evidence of avoiding sins. A man’s fasting in a dream is evidence of eating and kindness. Seeing yourself fasting for a long time in a dream is a sign of repentance. Interpretation of a dream about fasting for a single woman’s vision. For an unmarried girl in a dream that she fasts during Ramadan, this indicates obedience and closeness to God in obtaining what she wants, and God Almighty responds to her. Seeing fasting in a dream is evidence of marriage. Fasting in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of getting rid of obstacles. Seeing a dream about fasting for a woman Married woman: A married woman who dreams of fasting indicates the stability of her life with her husband and children. Fasting the month of Ramadan in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her fulfillment of the vow. Fasting in a married woman’s dream indicates pregnancy in the near future. After that, seeing a married woman fasting in a dream with empty dishes in front of her Evidence of a defect in the marital relationship. Interpretation of a dream about fasting for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees her large belly in a dream while she is pregnant, this indicates the presence of a male child. Then seeing a pregnant woman fasting in a dream other than the month of Ramadan is evidence of her reaching the highest positions and ranks. If a pregnant woman sees In her dream that she fasts one day, this means that she has committed some sin and disobedience. If a pregnant woman does not fast in the dream, this is a symbol of fatigue and problems.

Seeing a dream about fasting for a married woman A married woman who dreams of fasting indicates the stability of her life with her husband and children. title: Interpretation of buying gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Buying gold in a dream, gold is one of the precious metals that many people love to acquire, and seeing buying gold in a dream is one of the dreams that brings happiness to people’s hearts and makes them wonder about the different meanings and connotations that are associated with it and whether it brings goodness or otherwise, so we will explain this with some explanation. Details in the following lines of the article. Buying gold in a dream. Learn with us about the various indicators related to seeing yourself buying gold in a dream: Imam Al-Nabulsi mentioned that whoever sees buying gold in a dream, this is a sign of the happy and stable life that he lives. And if you see yourself buying a gold necklace, it will... This indicates that you will soon receive a job promotion with a satisfactory salary that will greatly improve your living conditions. If you dream of buying gold to give it to someone in reality, this is a sign that he occupies a special place in your heart and you always strive to make him and his heart happy. Sheikh Ibn Shaheen says that the vision of buying jewelry Gold in a dream indicates the arrival of a happy event in the dreamer’s family, such as the marriage of a son or daughter. But if you witness the theft of gold after buying it in a dream, this proves the state of sadness and despair that will control the dreamer in the coming period of his life. Buying gold in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, mentioned by the scholar The great Muhammad Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - has many interpretations related to the vision of buying gold in a dream, the most prominent of which are the following: If you see in a dream that you are buying a key or a chain made of gold, this indicates your ability to fulfill your desires and achieve your planned goals and objectives. If A student of knowledge saw during sleep that he was buying a gold pen, then this is evidence of his superiority over his colleagues and obtaining the highest grades. When a sick person dreams of buying gold, this is a sign of his recovery and a similar recovery soon, God willing. What is the interpretation of a dream about buying gold for single women? Here are the most prominent interpretations What was reported to the jurists regarding the vision of buying gold in a dream: If the girl was engaged and saw in a dream that she was buying gold, this proves her close relationship with the person she is in a relationship with and the intense love that unites them. If an unmarried woman sees herself buying gold during sleep and is still studying In fact, this is a sign of her success in her studies and her parents’ pride in her, in addition to her ability to achieve everything she desires. When a girl dreams of buying gold for her mother or one of her friends, this is a sign that a happy event will come to this person in reality. In the event that the girl is suffering from Sadness and anxiety in her life, and she saw in a dream that she was buying gold, as this symbolizes the end of the difficult period she is going through and the arrival of happiness, contentment, and psychological comfort. Interpretation of a dream about buying gold for a single girl from a person she loves. When a single girl dreams that she is buying gold with someone she loves, this is a sign of a strong relationship between them. And the extent of love, understanding and mutual respect between them. If a girl is in conflict with a person dear to her in reality and she sees in a dream that she is buying gold with him, this will lead to reconciliation and peace.

title: Interpretation of a dream about hitting a colleague in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hitting a classmate in a dream In the following lines we will present the interpretation of a dream about hitting a classmate in a dream and whether that is good or not, as reported by scholars and not personal interpretations..Interpretation of a dream about hitting a classmate in a dream Interpretation of a dream about hitting a classmate in a dream Beating can express About the concepts of benefit, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, as scholars have indicated that beating is considered a benefit for the killer, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself being beaten in a dream, this may be a sign of good changes, and God knows the unseen. When she sees beatings in a dream, it could be a sign of goodness and benevolence, And God is All-Knowing. Interpretation of dreams about my cousin chasing me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my cousin chasing me in a dream could lead to helping the cousin with the dreamer, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees that her cousin is chasing her in a dream, this may indicate the benefit that she will gain, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees her cousin chasing her in a dream, she can express kindness and livelihood, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about laughing with a cousin in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about laughing with a cousin in a dream can lead to kindness and livelihood, God willing. Likewise, when you see a married man laughing With his cousin, this can lead to relief from worry and sadness, and God knows all that is unseen. If the dreamer sees him laughing with his cousin, it may be a sign of kindness, God willing. When he sees a single girl laughing with her cousin, it may be a sign of good news. And God knows best. Interpretation of dreams that my uncle hugs me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that my uncle hugs me in a dream. Seeing a hug means success, and God knows everything that is not seen. If the dreamer sees an uncle hugging him in a dream, this may indicate that he is trying to achieve goals, and God knows best. Seeing the uncle’s chest can also indicate Feelings, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees her uncle’s chest in a dream, it could be a sign of love, and God knows the unseen. Also, beating a human being in a dream could mean that the dreamer was able to obtain his rights from the oppressor. And God knows the unseen. Also, seeing being beaten can indicate the ability to achieve goals and achieve them, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of my beloved hitting me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of my beloved hitting me in a dream may indicate problems with his beloved, but they will end, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees that her lover is hitting her with a stick in In a dream, this may mean failure to fulfill promises, and God is Great and All-Knowing. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a drum in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: The drum is a type of music because it is made of pottery or metal and is played with the most beautiful sounds, but many people see the drum on the drums and beat the drums, so they feel confused and anxious about this vision, and this is what they seek to interpret a dream about a drum in a dream. This dream definitely indicates to many Of the connotations and meanings that will be explained in detail according to leading translators and scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a drum by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a drum in a dream, as narrated by Ibn Sirin in the interpretation books, indicates false information. Also, seeing a drum in reality symbolizes a wine seller. As for As for seeing a drum and dancing together in a dream, this is not so bad. Seeing a drum with a muffled sound indicates that a missing friend has faced a disaster. Seeing a pilgrim’s drum on the caravan because it symbolizes a man leading the way. Interpretation of a dream about a drum by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing a drum, as he explains Ibn Shaheen, evidence of false statements and false news. Also, seeing a drum in a dream is a sign of a promise and false words. Seeing a dancing drum in a dream is a sign of great disasters. Interpretation of a dream about a drum for a single woman: Seeing a girl’s drum in a dream is a sign of lying. As for seeing a single drum in a dream, this is an indication of the revelation of a secret. A drummer in a dream indicates a person who helps spread heresy and rebellion. Seeing a girl as if she was beating a wedding party during a dream is evidence that she felt insulted. Likewise, hearing the sound of a drum in The dream symbolizes an evil woman in reality. The drum is also a symbol of a woman who cannot cover up her mistakes. Interpretation of a dream about a drum dancing: Seeing dancing in a dream is a dream without conscience for me. Seeing a dance in a dream portends the coming of misfortunes. Also, seeing a dance to the rhythm of the drum It means losing the respect of others. Singing to the beat of a drum in a dream is also evidence of immorality and evil. Seeing approval of the sound of a drum in a dream is evidence that you are following the followers of Satan’s call in reality. Interpretation of a dream about a drum for a married woman: Seeing a drum in a married woman’s dream is evidence of changes. In her living conditions. Also, a drum in a married woman’s dream is evidence of neglect and negligence of her husband or children.

This dream definitely indicates to many Of the connotations and meanings that will be explained in detail according to leading translators and scholars. title: Interpretation of seeing cups washed in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cups washed in a dream. Cups are a specialized vessel placed in a liquid substance and intended for drinking liquids such as water, juices, and various drinks. Seeing them washed in a dream indicates the death of worry and anxiety, new beginnings and the realization of hope, and we will explain them in detail by providing interpretations by senior imams in the interpretation Like Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of seeing washing cups in a dream is for a man, a woman, and a single young man. , an unmarried and married girl, a widow and a divorced woman, and a pregnant woman, so join us on a vision site. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing washing cups in a dream? To dream that you are washing cups in a dream means that the pain and suffering will disappear and the patient will recover. Seeing washing cups for the afflicted suggests Weakness and the end of worry. A dream about washing glasses for a prisoner indicates innocence and release from prison. Seeing a person washing glasses for a student of knowledge facilitates his studies and grants him success in life. Seeing a cup or cup indicates a servant. What is the interpretation of a dream about washing glasses for single women? Seeing washing glasses in a dream for a woman For an unmarried woman, it indicates the fall of worry and anxiety and the enjoyment of psychological calm and stability. Seeing yourself washing cups with soap and water indicates success in studies and may mean that you will find a prestigious job. What is the interpretation of dreaming about new cups for single women? Seeing buying new glasses in a dream for an unmarried woman It means that what is desired will come true. Seeing new cups filled with juice or milk indicates good luck and happiness in the coming season. What is the interpretation of a dream about new cups for a pregnant woman? Seeing a new cup filled with wine in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a baby girl. Seeing a cup filled with wine in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a baby girl. Filled with milk, honey, or juice indicates the birth of a newborn child, and seeing new cups indicates the approaching date of birth and the abundance of offspring. What is the interpretation of a dream about an empty cup for a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman sees an empty cup in her dream, this indicates a troubled birth and it may occur Miscarriage. Seeing the cup breaking for a pregnant woman indicates the death of the pregnant woman, and if the liquid or what is inside the cup falls, this indicates the death of the child and the survival of the mother. What is the interpretation of a dream about buying a set of glasses? Buying new glasses in a dream for unmarried women indicates gaining the desired hopes and achieving success. It can be Seeing empty glasses indicates emotional emptiness or fragile relationships and a life of frivolity and fun. What is the interpretation of a dream about tea cups? Seeing drinking tea in blue cups indicates good luck and the patient will recover from illness. Seeing tea cups indicates the pursuit of dreams and determination to overcome Adversity and obstacles. What is the interpretation of a dream about coffee cups? Seeing a cup of coffee in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that her engagement is approaching. If an unmarried girl sees that she is drinking a lot of coffee, this indicates her failure in a romantic relationship or the breakup of an engagement. Seeing many cups indicates Coffee leads to a lot of talking. What is the interpretation of a dream about plastic cups? Plastic cups indicate a fake and deceitful person.

title: Interpretation of seeing clothes in a dream and new clothes in a dream

preview.html: Buying clothes in a dream for a single womanInterpretation of a dream about buying clothes for a married womanInterpretation of a dream about buying new clothes by Ibn SirinA gift of new clothes in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about buying new clothes for a pregnant womanInterpretation of a dream about buying clothes for unmarried womenUnderwear in a dream for a married womanUnderwear in a dream for a single womanSeeing clothes in a dreamSeeing clean clothes in a dream This indicates the imminent appearance of joy for the pioneer, as well as the imminent realization of the dreamer’s desires and aspirations in life, while discarded clothes in the dream indicate that the dreamer will go through a state of distress. He will be sad in his next life and that he will pass through the obstacles and barriers that hinder the course of his life, but God Almighty will stand by his side until the end of this ordeal. In the event that you wear a formal uniform in a dream, this symbolizes the personal strength and greatness of the coordinator, as well as the possession of this person with high spiritual abilities. Which he enjoys, but these abilities lie within the person. Green clothes in a dream. Seeing green clothes in a dream symbolizes a person’s enjoyment of religious authority, commitment to religious principles in his life, and his closeness to God Almighty. If a person sees himself wearing green clothes, this indicates the righteousness of the person, and it is interpreted Also by obtaining abundant money from his inheritance. Seeing clothes in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. New clothes in a dream indicate the imminent appearance of new and recent events in the dreamer’s dream. However, if a person sees a group of clothes arranged and ironed in the dream, this indicates the occurrence of happy events at hand. And if the dreamer is sick, he will recover soon, God willing. Seeing the dead person with clothes on in a dream. Seeing the green clothing of the deceased in a dream that he died a martyr upon his death also indicates the good condition of the deceased with his Lord and his enjoyment of a high position with God, because the green color symbolizes the clothes of the people of Paradise. Seeing clothes in a dream for a single woman. Clothes in an unmarried woman’s dream, especially white clothes, indicate the girl’s imminent marriage date. While a single woman sees that she sees a gift of clothes, this indicates the presence of emotional relationships between the single person and the person who gave her the gift in the dream. Seeing clothes for a pregnant woman in Dream: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is buying new clothes for her newborn and that the newborn is a boy, then this vision is happy news about the arrival of the girl, but if the pregnant woman sees that she is buying clothes. As for her giving birth, this is good news that the pregnant woman will give birth to a boy. Seeing clothes in a dream for a married woman. Seeing clothes for a married woman indicates that the woman will soon become pregnant, and it also indicates the ability to feed and strengthen the bonds and interactive relationships between children. Interpretation of buying new clothes in a dream Your dream that you are buying or Wearing new clothes means a clear change in your life for the better. Buying piles of clothes means the death of someone she loves, and if a girl sees in her dream that she is buying new clothes, this is evidence of a new love in her life. And it was said: So

title: Interpretation of an earthly eclipse in a dream: Seeing the earth collapsing in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the eclipse for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman. If the earth separated from the road, the house, the room, and sank, I dreamed that the earth swallowed me, and more according to Ibn Sirin. A dream about the earth sinking in a dream. Dream interpretation experts say that seeing the earth collapsing in a dream and a change in its circumstances indicates a change in the state of affairs. The person is in this world as it shows the duration of exile and the journey in this world and it can also indicate death in the pursuit of this world and it also shows that this person is receiving money forbidden in this world. An eclipse in a dream is a threat from the Sultan. And whoever sees that the earth has fallen on it, there will be torment. An eclipse in a part of the earth is a dangerous disease that afflicts people there, or they are exposed to locusts, extreme cold, drought, or extreme fear. And whoever dreams that the earth has a shadow on it and it is evil, then it is torment that befalls him or a long journey. Seeing an earthquake in a dream Dream interpretation experts say that seeing an earthquake in a dream and seeing the earth exploding in a dream, both have the same interpretation, like anyone who sees that the earth has disappeared or because of an earthquake, This means that the ruler will leave the country and that the people of the country will be severely punished. It will be said after him that this is evidence of the existence of an epidemic that is affecting the land and eliminating its people. But if one sees in a dream that there is a great mountain being struck by an earthquake, this means that the people will be affected by great strife and conflicts and wars will break out among them. And there will be destruction, blood and devastation. In the earth. Seeing the earth in a dream. Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees in a dream the earth sinking and sees the gathering ground, then it shows many praiseworthy things about a person, such as that this person is a keeper of secrets and appears song after poverty and appears security after emerging from. And fear, and it also indicates that this person will marry a beautiful virgin girl, and show repentance and guidance. But if the earth sees that there is an unknown land that was divided and goodness came out of it, this means that the person will obtain many goods and inherit from his relative and it shows the spread of goodness, growth and blessing. Seeing a person That he has eclipsed the earth. Ibn al-Nabulsi says that if one sees in a dream that the earth has eclipsed him and become completely equal to the earth, this means that this person will rise among the people and that this person will benefit greatly from agriculture and struggle over land. It also indicates that this person will travel for trade. But if a person sees in his dream that he is eating from the ground, this indicates that this person will get a lot of money because he is eating from the ground.

title: Interpretation of seeing a burning fire in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a burning fire in a dream or a dream via the website Vision roy2a.com Seeing a fire or burning fires in a dream is considered one of the visions that causes panic and fear for those who see it. The dream depends on the condition and circumstances of the person who sees it and whether he is a single man or woman, married or pregnant. Today, through the Vision website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a burning fire in a dream in detail based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing a burning fire in a dream? Ibn Sirin: Seeing a burning fire in a dream indicates the outbreak of strife and the outbreak of conflicts. And wars. Seeing a burning fire in a dream indicates that the dreamer will attain great status and a high position in society. Seeing a burning fire in a dream indicates what the dreamer is committing of sins and transgressions. Seeing a burning fire in a dream may indicate that the dreamer wants to stop sinning and repent to God Almighty. Seeing a burning fire in a dream indicates the toil and effort that the dreamer exerts to earn a living. Seeing a burning fire in a dream indicates health or psychological problems that the viewer suffers from. See also: Interpretation of seeing a fire in a dream. What is the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen seeing a burning fire in a dream? Seeing a burning fire in a dream indicates that the visionary will achieve what he wants and strive without difficulty or fatigue. Seeing a burning fire without smoke in a dream indicates that the dreamer is seeking to get closer to those in positions and those with influence. Seeing a burning fire and injuring the dreamer in a dream indicates that he will be exposed to To great tribulation and judgment in the coming period. Seeing a house burning in a dream indicates the emergence of many disputes and disagreements among the people of this house. See also: Interpretation of seeing a burning house in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a burning fire in a dream for a man: Seeing a person burning in a dream indicates the pain and pressures that he is exposed to. The viewer in his life. Seeing a person burning in a dream indicates profits and profits that the viewer will achieve in the near future. Seeing a person burning fire and smoke rising in a dream indicates unfortunate events that will occur in the dreamer’s life and he will overcome them after a while. Seeing a man lighting a fire and people sitting to keep warm indicates Benevolence, benevolence, the spread of knowledge, the provision of food, and the arrival of blessing. See also: Interpretation of seeing coins in a dream Interpretation of seeing a burning fire in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a single woman lighting a fire in a dream indicates the hardships and hardships she faces in her life. Seeing an unmarried woman Lighting a fire without a flame or glowing in a dream indicates that he will get married soon. Seeing an unmarried woman lighting a fire and burning it in a dream announces that she will marry a good and special man and live a happy and stable life with him. Seeing a single woman lighting a fire in a dream indicates strong feelings of love and affection towards a specific person or The lack of these feelings in their lives. Seeing women alone trying to extinguish a burning fire in a dream says that she has no ambition to improve her life and make
